data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 71,752 believers in the state of Berlin.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Berlin, Germany
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Berlin, Germany know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Berlin, Germany.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,333,675 who are far from you in Berlin, Germany from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Berlin, Germany so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Thai people might believe through him.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Berlin.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Berlin, Germany to the gospel today.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Berlin, Germany.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
